oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Eddy Arnold and Bill Givens interview - Part 3 - 1956-01-28 - KYW
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 3 of a recorded interview between Bill Givens and Eddy Arnold, in Philadelphia, PA on January 28, 1956. Discussion topics include various Eddy Arnold songs. For Part 1, refer to TR003867_1. For Part 2, refer to TR003857.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Recording of Eddy Arnold's "I'll Hold You In My Heart (Until I Can Hold You In My Arms)" [incomplete] / (0:51) Lofs [phonetic] Candy advertisement / (1:47) [Unidentified radio announcer] announces a traffic report / (2:01) Bill Givens and Eddy Arnold discuss Eddy's song "That Do Make It Nice" / (3:00) Eddy Arnold discusses his song "Do You Know Where God Lives" / (4:20) Recording of Eddy Arnold's song "Do You Know Where God Lives" / (6:21) Vince Lee announces a Levittown, PA Jubilee advertisement / (7:13) Closing statements with KYW NBC Philadelphia, Pa. mention
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008
